document.full_text: president obama told a jubilant crowd at the central intelligence agency that the tracking and killing of osama bin laden was a crucial milestone in the larger war to 'defeat al qaeda.'
document.title: obama thanks the c.i.a. for hunting down bin laden
lines_and_colors: president obama told a jubilant crowd at the central intelligence agency that the tracking and killing of osama bin laden was a crucial milestone in the larger war to 'defeat al qaeda.'
